desc: 测试更新出差本表，带子属性，不含子表的案例
name: UpdateTravelSelfProperties
desc: 测试点：简单的更新，不含子表

oqls.desc: 根据记录ID更新出差记录，含出差人（仅父属性）
oqls.name: UpdateTravelCreatorById
oqls.oql: update Travel set creator = '{"name": "王五", "code": "wangwu"}' where applyId = '434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD'
oqls.sql: update TRAVEL set CREATOR_NAME = '王五' and CREATOR_KEY = 'wangwu' where APPLY_ID = '434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD'

oqls.desc: 根据记录ID更新出差记录，含出差人（仅父属性）（带变量）
oqls.name: UpdateTravelCreatorByIdVars
oqls.oql: update Travel set creator = #{creator} where applyId = '434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD'
oqls.sql: update TRAVEL set CREATOR_NAME = #{creator.name} and CREATOR_KEY = #{creator.key} where APPLY_ID = '434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD'

oqls.desc: 根据记录ID更新出差记录，含出差人（子属性展开）
oqls.name: UpdateTravelExpandCreatorById
oqls.oql: update Travel set creator(name, key) = '{"name": "王五", "code": "wangwu"}' where applyId = '434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD'
oqls.sql: update TRAVEL set CREATOR_NAME = '王五' and CREATOR_KEY = 'wangwu' where APPLY_ID = '434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD'

oqls.desc: 根据记录ID更新出差记录，含出差人（子属性展开）（带变量）
oqls.name: UpdateTravelExpandCreatorByIdVars
oqls.oql: update Travel set creator(name, key) = #{creator} where applyId = '434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD'
oqls.sql: update TRAVEL set CREATOR_NAME = #{creator.name} and CREATOR_KEY = #{creator.key} where APPLY_ID = '434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD'

oqls.desc: 根据记录ID更新出差记录，含出差人（子属性单独）
oqls.name: UpdateTravelSingleCreatorById
oqls.oql: update Travel set creator(name, key) = '{"name": "王五", "code": "wangwu"}' where applyId = '434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD'
oqls.sql: update TRAVEL set CREATOR_NAME = '王五' and CREATOR_KEY = 'wangwu' where APPLY_ID = '434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD'

oqls.desc: 根据记录ID更新出差记录，含出差人（子属性单独）（带变量）
oqls.name: UpdateTravelSingleCreatorByIdVars
oqls.oql: update Travel set creator.name = #{creator.name} and creator.key = #{creator.key} where applyId = '434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD'
oqls.sql: update TRAVEL set CREATOR_NAME = #{creator.name} and CREATOR_KEY = #{creator.key} where APPLY_ID = '434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD'
